name: Classic Snake Game
description:
Have you ever wondered the classic retro style snake game that we used to play on gaming consoles during those old days? The retro style, the sound, the score, these are all our nostalgic memories once we were indulged into this.

Here, I'm bringing the same old classic retro style snake game. You will feel the same console color, retro dots, the music, the score etc.

The game has five different levels to play with, you can control the speed of the game as well, as you increase the speed, the snake movement will increase.

As a snake, your goal is to eat the food, grow yourself as much as with in the retro world. Ensure you are not biting yourself, or biting the walls. As you keep eating the food, your score will increase.

So, go ahead and download the game, and get yourself traveled back to your good old school days. :) I'm sure, the game will bring you the nostalgic feelings in you.

Please do rate the app, and leave your comments. I would be happy to address your concerns and make the game the best snake game in the store.
